event.title: Christmas Booze-up
event.description:
A chance to eat pizza, drink fine beer and be generally merry!

Talks on:

The Future of Humanity FuelPHP The Cleanest Code: or, Uncle Bob Driven Development (UBDD) Brightpearl have generously offered to sponsor this event, so it will be hosted in the Brightpearl offices (between Cabot Circus and Portland Square). There will be beer (free as in beer), pizza (also free as in beer) and assorted revelry.

Places may be limited so please RSVP.

Â 

Driving to this event is not to be recommended.
